comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on January 16, 2023, 02:02:28 PMIt's not very popular in the gambling community because it's not a Bitcoin-based casino but on-chain casinos could be the next big thing in the casino industry...On-Chain casinos used to be a big thing in the casinos' industry at the start of crypto gambling, there used to be sites like Satoshibones or Luckybit where users place bets direct sending X amount to the game address and they get the result of the bet to the address. But there was 2 problems with it.1.-Time: Waiting for the block to see the bet result wasn't nice at all, it gives a bad experience to the users.2.-Double Spends: These casinos used to let the users get the reward before the transaction gets a confirmation, and if the bet loses then the attacker could do a double spend to avoid losing his coins.
